text.*:
This article needs attention from an expert in Roots music. Please add a reason or a talk parameter to this template to explain the issue with the article. WikiProject Roots music may be able to help recruit an expert. (May 2008)

Asian music encompasses numerous different musical styles originating from a large number of Asian countries.

Musical traditions in Asia

A Mongolian musician
A Lady Playing the Tanpura; Rajasthan
A musical theatre group in Baghdad
